properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O Jesus, King Most Wonderful, Thou Conqueror Renowned, Thou Sweetness Most Ineffable, In Whom All Joys Are Found

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When Once Thou Visitest The Heart, Then Truth Begins To Shine, Then Earthly Vanities Depart, Then Kindles Love Divine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O Jesus, Light Of All Below, Thou Fount Of Life And Fire, Surpassing All The Joys We Know, And All We Can Desire;

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jesus, may all confess Thy name, Thy wondrous love adore; And, seeking thee, themselves inflame To seek thee more and more.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Thee, Jesus, May Our Voices Bless, Thee May We Love Alone; And Ever In Our Lives Express The Image Of Thine Own.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: O Jesus! thou the beauty art Of angel worlds above; Thy name is music to the heart Inflaming it with love.
